tuv.seg: Appealing the Leaving Certificate results
Achomharc a dhéanamh in aghaidh torthaí na hArdteistiméireachta
Students who are not satisfied with the marks they got in one or more of their Leaving Certificate results can appeal those results to the State Examinations Commission

Mura bhfuil micléinn sásta leis na marcanna a fuair siad in ábhar amháin nó níos mó i scrúdú na hArdteistiméireachta is féidir leo dul i dteagmháil le Coimisiún na Scrúduithe Stáit agus achomharc a dhéanamh
Before you make the decision to appeal your result(s), you may view your examination script and then make your decision
Is féidir leat féachaint ar an script (nó na scripteanna) a scríobh tú agus cinneadh a dhéanamh ansin achomharc a dhéanamh nó a mhalairt
Viewing your examination papers
Féachaint ar do pháipéir scrúdaithe
When you receive your exam results, your school will also have a personalised application form that shows your details, including your subjects
Nuair a fhaigheann tú torthaí na scrúduithe beidh foirm iarratais pearsantaithe ag do scoil a léireoidh do shonraí go léir, d'ábhair scrúduithe ina measc
If you decide you would like to view a particular paper, you mark the form accordingly
Má thograíonn tú breathnú ar pháipéar faoi leith, ba chóir duit an fhoirm a mharcáil dá réir
You must return the completed form to view your exam papers to your school by a specified date
Caithfidh tú an fhoirm chómhlánaithe ag iarraidh breathnú ar do pháipéar/pháipéir scrúdaithe a chur ar ais chuig do scoil roimh spriocdháta sonraithe
The Organising Superintendent appointed by the State Examinations Commission will assign you to one of the viewing sessions
Déanfaidh an Maor Eagrúcháin ceaptha ag Coimisiún na Scrúduithe Stáit seisiún breathnaithe a ainmniú duit
You can find information about viewing marked examination papers on the State Examinations Commission website
Tá tuilleadh eolais maidir le féachaint ar do pháipéir scrúdaithe ar shuíomh gréasáin Choimisiúin na Scrúduithe Stáit
The results of oral examinations or the marks for practical examinations cannot be viewed
Ní féidir breathnú ar thorthaí na scrúduithe béil nó na marcanna a fhaightear i scrúduithe praiticiúla
Only the scripts from the written examinations can be viewed
Ní féidir breathnú ach ar na scripteanna ó na scrúduithe scríofa
The State Examinations Commission will provide your school with a personalised appeal application form
Cuirfidh Coimisiún na Scrúduithe Stáit foirm iarratais pearsanta ar fáil do d’scoil
(For external candidates, this form will be enclosed with your examination results.) You indicate the subjects you wish to appeal on the appeal form
(Más iarrthóir seachtrach tú beidh an fhoirm seo iniata le torthaí do scrúduithe.) Léiríonn tú ar an bhfoirm seo na hábhair ar mhian leat achomharc a dhéanamh futhu
A result may be upgraded or downgraded as a result of an appeal
Is féidir na torthaí a uasghrádú nó a íosghrádú de thoradh achomhairc
Your application to appeal your 2016 examination results must be received by 7 September 2016
Caithfidh d'iarratas le hachomharc a dhéanamh in aghaidh do thorthaí i scrúduithe 2016 a bheith istigh roimh 7 Meán Fómhair 2016
Your script will be sent to an appeal examiner for re-marking
Seolfar do script chuig scrúdaitheoir achomhairc lena athmharcáil
This examiner will be different from the examiner who originally marked your work
Ní hionann an té seo agus an scrúdaitheoir a rinne do chuid oibre a mharcáil ar an gcéad dul síos
The same marking scheme is used for re-marking
Beidh an scéim chéanna mharcála in úsáid don athmharcáil, áfach
This means that appeal examiners apply the same standards in re-marking as were applied to all candidates in the original examination

Mar sin beidh na caighdeáin chéanna ag na scrúdaitheoirí achomhairc agus iad i mbun athmharcála is a bhí ag na scrúdaitheoirí eile agus iad ag scrúdú scripteanna na n-iarrthóirí go léir sa chéad mharcáil
There is further information about the appeal process on the website of the State Examinations Commission
Tá tuilleadh eolais faoin próiseas an achomharc ar shuíomh idirlín Choimisiúin na Scrúduithe Stáit
If you are not happy with the outcome of your appeal, you may request an appeal review by the Independent Appeals Scrutineers
Mura bhfuil tú sásta leis an toradh achomhairc, is féidir leat iarratas ar Scrúdanóirí Neamhspleácha Achomhaircar a dhéanamh
Application forms for an appeal review are provided with your appeal results
Tá foirm iarratais soláthraithe le do thorthaí achomhairc
Rectification outside of the appeal process
Ceartú lasmuigh de phróiseas na n-achomharc
If you have viewed your script and believe there is a clear discrepancy between the mark awarded and the subsequent grade awarded, you also have means of redress
Má fhéachann tú ar do script agus má chreideann tú go bhfuil difríocht shoiléir idir an marc a bronnadh agus an grád a fuair tú, tá bealach agat le sásamh a fháil
You should ask the Organising Superintendent at the viewing session for a Form AP1 and complete in accordance with the instructions
Ba chóir duit a iaraidh ar an Maor Eagrúchain atá ag an seisiún breathnaithe foirm AP1 a thabhairt duit agus ansin é a líonadh de réir na treoracha

(You should note that this facility applies only where it's clear that the total mark is inconsistent with the grade awarded and where this matter can be resolved administratively). Information on appealing your results and rectification outside of the appeal process is available on the State Examinations Commission's website

(Tabhair faoi ndeara nach féidir leas a bhaint as an áis seo ach amháin nuair is soiléir nach bhfuil an marc iomlán ar aon dul leis an ngrád a fuair tú, agus gur féidir le lucht riaracháin an scéal a chur ina cheart.) Tá breis eolais maidir le próiseas an achomhairc agus ceartú lasmuigh den chóras achomhairc le fáil ar shuíomh idirlín Choimisiúin na Scrúduithe Stáit
One person may accompany the student when he/she is looking at the script
Is féidir le duine amháin a bheith in éineacht leis an macléinn nuair atá sé/sí ag féachaint ar an script
The student cannot arrange for someone else to look at a script in his/her place
Níl sé de chead ag an macléinn a iarradh ar dhuine eile féachaint ar a script ina (h)áit
The appeal fee is €40 per subject for the Established Leaving Certificate and must be paid in advance
Is é €40an táille achomhairc do gach ábhar den gnáth-Ardteist agus caithfear í a íoc roimh ré
The appeal fee for the Applied Leaving Certificate is €15.50 per subject
Is é €15.50 an táille achomhairc do gach ábhar den Ardteist Fheidhmeannach
This fee is returned to you if the result is upgraded
Seoltar an táille seo ar ais chugat má dhéantar uasghrádú ar an toradh a fuair tú
Refunds will be made through your school, if you are entered for the exam by your school
Is trí do scoil a dhéanfar an aisíoc, más í sin a rinne tú a iontráil don scrúdú
The student fills in the personalised appeal application form
Líonann an mac léinn an fhoirm phearsanaithe achomhairc
The student brings this form to a bank and pays the appeal fee using the bank giro facility on that form
Tugann an mac léinn an fhoirm seo go dtí an banc agus íocann sé/sí an táille achomhairc trí áis an gíoró bainc atá uirthi a úsáid
There is a unique reference number on the bank giro form so this form must be used and not the bank's own bank giro form
Is féidir an táille achomhairc a íoc ar líne freisin
(Using the bank's own giro form may delay or totally invalidate your appeal because it could prove very difficult to subsequently prove you paid the appropriate fee.) The bank must stamp the form
Tá sainuimhir tagartha ar an bhfoirm gíoró bainc agus caithfear an fhoirm seo a úsaid
The student must bring the form back to the school
Ná bac leis an bhfoirm gíoró bainc atá ag an mbanc féin

You can also pay your appeal fee online. You must then provide a printed copy of this e-mail confirmation to the Organising Superintendent at the school/centre where you sat your examination, along with your completed appeal application form

(Má bhaineann tú leas as foirm gíoró bainc atá ag an mbanc d’fhéadfadh sé moill ar chur ar do achomharc, nó d’fhéadfadh sé é a dhéanamh neamhbhailí ar fad, toisc go mbeadh sé an-deacair ar ball a chruthú gur íoc tú an táille chuí.) Caithfidh an banc an fhoirm a stampáil
The school/centre will associate your completed appeal application and evidence of payment with the relevant examination script(s) and send them to the State Examinations Commission
Caithfidh an mac léinn an fhoirm a thabhairt ar ais ar scoil
The closing date for receipt of appeals by the State Examinations Commission for 2016 is Wednesday 7 September 2016
Is é an 7 Meán Fómhair 2016 an dáta scoir maidir le hachomhairc a bheith istigh ag Coimisiún na Scrúduithe Stáit do 2016
This means your school will have to post your application on Tuesday 6 September so you need to have paid the fee and returned the form to your school on Monday 5 September or early on 6 September

Ciallaíonn sé seo go mbeidh ar do scoil d’iarratas a chur sa phost ar an 6 Meán Fómhair ar a dhéanaí. Mar sin caithfidh tú an táille a íoc agus an fhoirm a bheith ar ais ag do scoil ar an 5 Meán Fómhair nó go luath ar an 6 Meán Fómhair
